alert.note: Alert for Camas Prairie; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Upper Weiser River; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 3:40AM MST until December 25 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulation of 2 to 4 inches, except 6 to 12 inches over the mountains, through Christmas Day. Gusty winds will cause areas of blowing snow and significantly reduced visibilities. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Oregon and south central, southwest and west central Idaho. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There may be periods of lighter snow accumulation between periods of steadier snow through Christmas Day.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Camas Prairie; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Upper Weiser River; Western Magic Valley
